| ---------------- | ---

| New feature?     | yes/no
| BC breaks?       | yes/no
| Deprecations?    | yes/no
| New tests added? | yes/not needed
| Fixed tickets    | Fixes #ticket number (set to none if no tickets are fixed, repeat template for each ticket fixed)
